trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> objects in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una raccolta di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref> gli oggetti in un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The SubMenuStyleCollection class is used to store and manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> objects in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: La classe SubMenuStyleCollection viene utilizzata per archiviare e gestire una raccolta di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>gli oggetti in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control uses the SubMenuStyleCollection class as the underlying data type of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controllo utilizza la classe SubMenuStyleCollection come il tipo di dati sottostante la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> property provides additional style choices in addition to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicMenuStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A>proprietà sono disponibili opzioni di stile aggiuntive oltre al <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuStyle%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicMenuStyle%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicMenuStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first style in the SubMenuStyleCollection collection corresponds to the submenu style for the first level of the menu.
trans-unit.target: Il primo stile nella raccolta SubMenuStyleCollection corrisponde allo stile di sottomenu per il primo livello del menu.

trans-unit.source: The second style in the collection corresponds to the submenu style for the second level of the menu, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Il secondo stile nell'insieme corrisponde allo stile di sottomenu per il secondo livello di menu e così via.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> property is most often used to generate a navigation menu, like a Web site map, where menu items at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have submenus.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A>proprietà viene spesso utilizzata per generare un menu di navigazione, come la mappa di un sito Web in cui le voci di menu a un determinato livello hanno lo stesso aspetto, indipendentemente dalla presenza di sottomenu.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SubMenuStyleCollection class inherits most of its members from the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: La classe SubMenuStyleCollection eredita la maggior parte dei relativi membri dalla <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the inherited members, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui membri ereditati, vedere il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: Adds a submenu style to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge uno stile di sottomenu per il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.OnInsert%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> methods are called before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> instance is added to the collection, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnInsertComplete%2A> method is called after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> instance is added.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.OnInsert%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>metodi vengono chiamati prima di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>istanza viene aggiunto alla raccolta e <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnInsertComplete%2A>metodo viene chiamato dopo il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>aggiunge l'istanza.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnInsertComplete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.OnInsert%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> instance to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref> istanza da aggiungere alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The position in the collection at which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> instance was inserted.
trans-unit.target: La posizione nella raccolta in corrispondenza del quale il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref> istanza è stata inserita.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> collection contains a specific <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Determina se un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"> </xref> raccolta contiene un oggetto specifico <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> method is called to validate the `style` parameter before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> collection is checked.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>metodo viene chiamato per convalidare il `style` parametro prima di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>controllo dell'insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> instance to locate in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref> istanza da individuare nella <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> instance is found in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref> istanza viene trovata nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"> </xref> raccolta; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If is passed as the style parameter, is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se viene passato come il style parametro viene restituito.

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> collection to an array, starting at a specified array index.
trans-unit.target: Copia il contenuto di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"> </xref> insieme in una matrice, iniziando in corrispondenza dell'indice matrice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> objects are copied to the destination array in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>gli oggetti vengono copiati nella matrice di destinazione nello stesso ordine in cui l'enumeratore scorre la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> objects copied from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Matrice unidimensionale che costituisce la destinazione del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref> oggetti copiati dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The `array` must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: Il `array` deve avere un'indicizzazione in base zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero `array` da cui avviare la copia.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexè minore di zero.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> of the data type that corresponds to the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> del tipo di dati che corrisponde all'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The CreateKnownType method is a helper function that is used to create an <xref:System.Object> of the data type that corresponds to the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo CreateKnownType è una funzione di supporto che viene utilizzata per creare un <xref:System.Object>del tipo di dati che corrisponde all'indice specificato.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The index is often determined by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A> method to create an array of supported data types and then searching the array for the desired data type.
trans-unit.target: L'indice viene spesso determinato tramite il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A>metodo per creare una matrice di tipi di dati supportati e quindi la ricerca nella matrice del tipo di dati desiderato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `index` parameter is not used in this implementation of the method and is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Il `index` parametro non viene utilizzato in questa implementazione del metodo e viene ignorato.

trans-unit.source: You should always pass in `null` for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: È sempre opportuno passare `null` per questo parametro.

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the method always returns an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> object.
trans-unit.target: Questa implementazione del metodo restituisce sempre un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used only by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questo metodo viene utilizzato solo dagli sviluppatori di controlli.

trans-unit.source: The index of the data type to create.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del tipo di dati da creare.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used in this implementation of the method; therefore, you should always pass in <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Questo parametro non viene usato in questa implementazione del metodo. Pertanto, è sempre opportuno passare <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Always returns an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce sempre un oggetto vuoto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Creates an array of <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName> objects that contains the supported data types of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una matrice di <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName> gli oggetti che contiene i tipi di dati supportati il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The GetKnownTypes method is a helper function that is used to create an array of data types supported by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetKnownTypes è una funzione di supporto che viene utilizzata per creare una matrice di tipi di dati supportati dalla <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>

trans-unit.source: The array is often searched to determine the index of a desired data type.
trans-unit.target: La matrice viene spesso eseguita per determinare l'indice di un tipo di dati desiderato.

trans-unit.source: The index is then passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.CreateKnownType%2A> method to create an <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> of the corresponding data type.
trans-unit.target: L'indice viene quindi passato al <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.CreateKnownType%2A>metodo per creare un <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>del tipo di dati corrispondente.</xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.CreateKnownType%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used only by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questo metodo viene utilizzato solo dagli sviluppatori di controlli.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName> objects that contains the data types supported by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName> che contiene i tipi di dati supportati dagli oggetti di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Determines the location of a specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina la posizione di un oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref> oggetto di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> method is called to validate the `style` parameter before the index is returned.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>metodo viene chiamato per convalidare il `style` parametro prima che venga restituito l'indice.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> object to locate in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref> oggetto da individuare nella <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The index of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> object if it is found in the list; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: L'indice dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref> oggetto se è presente nell'elenco; in caso contrario, -1.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> object into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref> nell'oggetto di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"> </xref> raccolta in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: If index is -1, `style` is inserted at the beginning of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se l'indice è -1, `style` viene inserito all'inizio del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>

trans-unit.source: If index equals the number of items in the collection, `style` is appended to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se l'indice è uguale al numero di elementi nella raccolta, `style` viene aggiunto alla fine del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> method is called to validate the style parameter before it is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>metodo viene chiamato per convalidare il parametro di stile prima di essere aggiunto alla raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.OnInsert%2A> method is called before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> object is inserted into the collection, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnInsertComplete%2A> method is called after the object is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.OnInsert%2A>metodo viene chiamato prima di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>oggetto viene inserito nella raccolta e <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnInsertComplete%2A>metodo viene chiamato dopo l'inserimento dell'oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnInsertComplete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.OnInsert%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> object should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: L'indice in base zero in corrispondenza del quale il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref> deve essere inserito l'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> object to insert into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref> oggetto da inserire nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The specified index is outside the range of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Specificato index è compreso nell'intervallo della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"> </xref> raccolta è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: The specified style is .
trans-unit.target: The specified style is .

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> object at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> collection object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un riferimento al <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref> oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato nella <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"> </xref> oggetto della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The location of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref> oggetto di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Un riferimento di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The index parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count*> property value.
trans-unit.target: Il parametro di indice è minore di zero o maggiore di o uguale al <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count*>valore della proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count*>

trans-unit.source: Called before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Add*> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Insert*> methods.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato prima di <> </> *> e <> </> *> metodi.

trans-unit.source: The OnInsert method is called before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Add%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Insert%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Viene chiamato il metodo OnInsert prima il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Add%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Insert%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override the OnInsert method in custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> classes to perform custom processing of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> objects before they are added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: È possibile sostituire il metodo OnInsert personalizzato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>classi per eseguire l'elaborazione personalizzata di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>oggetti prima che vengano aggiunti per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which `value` should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: L'indice in base zero in corrispondenza del quale `value` deve essere inserito.

trans-unit.source: The object to insert into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da inserire nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: value is not of type .
trans-unit.target: valuenon è di tipo .

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove la prima occorrenza dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref> dall'oggetto di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A> method is called to validate the style parameter before it is used to locate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> object to remove from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>metodo viene chiamato per convalidare il parametro di stile prima che venga utilizzato per individuare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>oggetto da rimuovere dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemove%2A> method is called before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> object is removed, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemoveComplete%2A> method is called after the object is removed from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemove%2A>metodo viene chiamato prima di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>oggetto viene rimosso e <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemoveComplete%2A>metodo viene chiamato dopo l'oggetto viene rimosso dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemoveComplete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemove%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> object to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref> oggetto da rimuovere dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"> </xref> raccolta è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> object at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref> oggetto in corrispondenza della posizione specificata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemove%2A> method is called before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> object is removed from the collection, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemoveComplete%2A> method is called after the object is removed from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemove%2A>metodo viene chiamato prima di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle>oggetto viene rimosso dalla raccolta e <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemoveComplete%2A>metodo viene chiamato dopo l'oggetto viene rimosso dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemoveComplete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.OnRemove%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> object to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: La posizione di indice in base zero di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref> oggetto da rimuovere dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"> </xref> raccolta è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: Instructs a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"></xref> object contained by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"></xref> collection to record its entire state to view state.
trans-unit.target: Indica un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyle"> </xref> oggetto incluso il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection"> </xref> insieme di registrare l'intero stato di visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The SetDirtyObject method is called internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager.SaveViewState%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Add%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Insert%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo SetDirtyObject viene chiamato internamente dal <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager.SaveViewState%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Add%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Insert%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SubMenuStyleCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager.SaveViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object that should serialize itself completely.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che deve essere serializzato completamente.
